author: Ryan Daws
description:
A developer, curious about a slight performance lag on his computer, accidentally discovered the XZ attack—a backdoor that reminds us some of our biggest open-source security threats are from decades of unlearned lessons. The hero of our story is Andres Freund, a Microsoft developer who in March 2024 noticed his Linux system’s ssh service was […]

The post XZ attack reveals unlearned open-source security lessons appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: XZ attack reveals unlearned open-source security lessons
